thread.title: A great choice! Review
thread.title_full: A great choice! - Review of Phoenix Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: francesco12376
title: A great choice! Review
text:
I found this hotel too late, so I wasn't able to book for our whole stay. We spend our first night elsewhere, but as I got to London I decided to book the other nights here: maybe one of the best choice I did!
The hotel is clean and nice, staff is kind and available for every request. Position is ridiculously good, there are two undergroud stops in a 300 meters range (District-Circle and Central line). Very near to Kengsinton park.
Breakfast is good.
In few words I'll always check for this hotel when I'll get back in London.
